ComicInfo.Summary:
The Curse of Spawn: A retelling of the events of Spawn's life.
First Strike: A villain targets Sara Pezzini, Lara Croft and Strykeforce as a first strike.
Feel the Fury of Furnace: Mark is still dealing with his father's betrayal.
Power Shortage: A member of the Vicious Circle breaks into Dragon's house for revenge.
ComicInfo.Title: The Curse of Spawn; First Strike; Feel the Fury of Furnace; Power Shortage
